title: [综合|付费]Essentials MySQL Storage Extension —— 把ess数据塞进MySQL [1.7.10+]
author: ZeroSheep
txt_content:
本帖最后由 ZeroSheep 于 2020-6-6 17:26 编辑 c2bfb3c3130a2697509e152157e59a42e777d84b[1].png (2.15 KB, 下载次数: 1) 下载附件 2020-5-30 16:16 上传 Essentials MySQL Storage ExtensionEssentials MySQL存储拓展 | 简介        Essentials MySQL Storage Extension是什么东西呢？Essentials相信大家都很熟悉，但是Essentials MySQL Storage Extension是怎么东西呢，下面就让楼主带大家一起了解吧。 　　Essentials MySQL Storage Extension，其实就是ess同步插件，大家可能会很惊讶Essentials怎么会不支持MySQL储存数据呢？但事实就是这样，楼主也感到非常惊讶。 　　这就是关于Essentials MySQL Storage Extension插件了，大家有什么想法呢，欢迎在评论区告诉楼主一起讨论哦！     你还在寻找economy的同步方案? 你还在纳闷无法全服ban玩家?     这个拓展就可以完美地解决这个问题!     Essentials MySQL Storage Extension,简称EMS,支持同步essentials的所有数据(包括但不限于经济,邮件,家等等).凡是存在essentials\userdata文件夹下的数据都可以同步. | 特色   ● 支持在线和离线UUID (不适用于非UUID服务器,所以只适用于1.7.10及更高版本)   ● 支持一键删除数据库中不活跃玩家数据   ● 兼容性极高,可同步下列插件离线时获得的金钱       ○ 兼容QuickShop插件       ○ 兼容ChestShop插件       ○ 兼容AuctionHouse插件       ○ 兼容PlayerShopGUI插件       ○ 兼容Shopboot插件   ● 提供在服务器关闭或重新启动时删除整个Essentials/userdata文件夹的选项   ● 提供当玩家离开服务器并且数据保存在数据库中时自动删除用户数据文件的选项   ● 支持使用命令将所有用户数据文件导入数据库。   ● 支持使用命令将数据库中的所有用户导出回essentials用户数据文件夹 (因此可以随时删除插件而不丢失数据)   ● 支持使用命令从数据库数据中获取经济排名   ● 能够自动过滤玩家的数据文件并删除无用数据   ● 配置简单易懂   ● 轻量级,使用很少的资源,异步执行同步任务.不影响服务器性能或TPS |  安装   1.将插件放在plugins文件夹下,确保已安装Essentials   2.启动服务器,等待其生成配置.生成完毕后关闭服务器.   3.打开配置文件,设置数据库信息并配置插件      你需要自行创建数据库,插件会在你指定的库中自动创建表.      数据库创建教程自行百度,这里就不赘述.   4.启动服务器,检查服务器后台是否有报错,插件是否正常运行.   5.输入 /ems import 将essentials的数据导入数据库. 配置文件(部分汉化): #MySQL 配置 Database: Mysql: #MySQL 服务器地址 Host: 127.0.0.1 #MySQL 服务器端口 (默认是 3306) Port: 3306 #库名 (注意!你需要自行创建库,插件才会创建表) DatabaseName: 'mydatabase' #表名 (插件会在库中自动创建它们) TableName: 'Essentials_userdata' #账户 User: 'admin' #密码 Password: 'cheesecake' #是否使用SSL(不清楚就不要改) SslEnabled: false RemoveInactiveUsers: #是否启用自动清理旧帐户 | (填入true 或者 false) enabled: false #多少天后判定为旧帐户 | 默认60天 inactivity: 60
#以下内容作用不大,故没有汉化.不建议修改. #Plugin settings Settings: #Built in support for other plugins. # NOTE! A server restart is needed for changes here to take effect! SupportFor: #Support for QuickShop plugin: https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/quickshop.18676/ #If you use Essentials Economy and QuickShop plugin enable this option. #Set the tax value same as in QuickShop config. To disable set: QuickShopTax: 0.00 QuickShop: false QuickShopTax: 0.05 #Support for ChestShop plugin: https://dev.bukkit.org/projects/chestshop ##If you use Essentials Economy and ChestShop plugin enable this option. ChestShop: false #Enable support for plugin ShopChestPlayerShopGUI+: https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/playershopgui.37707/ PlayerShopGUI-Support: false #Enable support for plugin AuctionHouse: https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/auction-house-1-7-1-11.6050/ AuctionHouse-Support: false #Enable support for plugin ShopChest: https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/shopchest.11431/ ShopChest-Support: false #Delete the entire Essentials/userdata folder on server shutdown or restart. #NOTE! Will delete all users files. Make sure you import them first. RemoveUserDataFolder: false #Delete the data file for players that leave the server after his data is saved on database. RemoveUserFile: false #Save online players data files to database. If this is disabled the data will be saves only when the player leaves the server. SaveDataTask: #Enable or disable the data save task. | (true or false) enabled: true #Time between data saves in minutes. | Default 3 min. interval: 3 #Hide the data save task log messages. hideLogMessages: false #Prevent saving of some Essentials users data. SaveFilter: #Enable or disable the filter. enabled: false #The following data will be removed from essentials users data file when saving. preventSaveOf: - 'logoutlocation' - 'lastlocation' #Add support for essentials commands when players are offline. EssentialsCmdIntegration: #Support for essentials /pay command for offline players. PayCmd: true #Support for essentials /balance command for offline players. BalanceCmd: true #Support for essentials /seen command for offline players. SeenCmd: true #Support for essentials /eco commands for offline players. EcoCmd: true #Chat messages with color and format codes support. #Minecraft Color and Format Codes: http://minecraft.gamepedia.com/Formatting_codes ChatMessages: NoPermission: '&4[EMS] &cYou don''t have permission!' ImportCmd: '&2[EMS] &aImport essentials data started! Check server console for progress.' ExportCmd: '&2[EMS] &aExport essentials data started! Check server console for progress.' CmdNotFound: '&4[EMS] &cCommand not found! For help do /ems' MoneySymbol: ' MoneySyncDisabled: '&4[EMS] &cMoney sync is disabled.' BalTopTitle: '&6&l Money Top 10' BalTopUpdate: '&2[EMS] &aUpdating Money Top 10 list...' BalTopEmptyDB: '&4[EMS] &cDatabase is empty!' BalTopUsage: '&4[EMS] &cUsage: &6/baltop' RemoveCmdUsage: '&6[EMS] &eUsage: &6/ems delete ' RemoveCmdComplete: '&2[EMS] &aUser removed from database!' RemoveCmdNotFound: '&4[EMS] &cUser not found in the database!' ReloadCmdBlocked: '&4&l[EMS] &cServer reload is not good for plugins! For safety this command is blocked.' PlayerNotFound: '&4[System] &cPlayer not found!' PayAmountPositive: '&4[System] &cAmount must be positive!' PayFormatError: '&4[System] &cAmount must be a number!' PayNoMoney: '&4[System] &cYou do not have sufficient funds!' PayComplete: '&2[System]&a [        DISCUZ_CODE_46        ]lt;amount> has been sent to&e ' TakeComplete: '&2[System]&a [        DISCUZ_CODE_46        ]lt;amount> has been taken from&e ' ResetComplete: '&2[System]&a Money reset complete for&e ' BalanceCmd: '&2[System]&a Balance of&e &a:&c [        DISCUZ_CODE_46        ]lt;amount>' ReloadCmd: '&2[System]&a Config reload complete' HelpScreen: - ' ' - ' &6&lEssentialsMysqlStorage Help' - ' &7Get Money Top 10: ' - ' &e/ems baltop' - ' &7Import Essentials data to database: ' - ' &e/ems import' - ' &7Export Essentials data back to files: ' - ' &e/ems export' - ' &7Kick all players and save their data: ' - ' &e/ems saveAndKick' - ' &7Remove a user from the database ' - ' &e/ems remove ' - ' &7Reload plugin config.' - ' &e/ems reload' - ' ' #Minecraft Color and Format Codes: http://minecraft.gamepedia.com/Formatting_codes KickMessages: saveAndKickCommand: '&cServer is restarting please come back in 20 seconds.'复制代码 | 指令 指令所需权限用途/ems 或 /ems help  无 打开帮助菜单 /ems baltop EMS.baltop 获取经济排行前十的玩家/ems reload EMS.admin 重载插件/ems import EMS.admin 将ess插件的所有本地数据导入MySQL这将覆盖掉已有数据/ems export EMS.admin 将MySQL中的数据导出插件ess数据文件夹(userdata)这不会删除MySQL内的数据.导出前请先确认是否已禁用本地数据/ems saveAndKick EMS.admin 踢出服务器内所有玩家并保存他们的数据/ems remove EMS.admin 删除数据库内的指定玩家数据 | 下载     付费插件,不提供站内下载.     请前往spigot原帖购买>>     https://www.spigotmc.org/resourc ... ge-extension.25673/     2020年5月30日售价:   4.99USD    折合人民币 35.6CNY    本人不提供代购服务,勿扰.

replies.author: Not103
replies.txt_content: ess这么经典的插件,数据库支持终于有人搬运了
